Updated ksoap2 library to latest version

Added Hard Refresh button in UDD, DFTP and in Common Interests. When pressed it ignores cache and always fetches fresh results
Fix crash in PTS menu item
Add ckChangeLog to show changes on first load of updated app
Added search for similar package names (activated in settings) feature
Fixed service to display info only when app is in foreground
Fixed a bug where you had to press twice back if you viewed details from udd or dftp
Fixed other minor bugs that crashed the app
Re-published the app again because I renamed the main package to net.debian.debiandroid after a request
